Class Kiosk

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Kiosk
  • public class Kiosk
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class that handles user input and output.
    Author:
    Aaron Browne, Harshkumar Patel

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This function serves as the backbone of the program. It reads lines of input and either calls a function accordingly or prints "Invalid Command!"

      • cancel

        private void cancel​(java.lang.String com)
        Cancels the provided appointment, if the appointment is a valid one.
        Parameters:
        com - The input string that holds information about the appointment to be cancelled.

      • book

        private void book​(java.lang.String com)
        Books the provided appointment, if the appointment is a valid and does not conflict with any other appointments.
        Parameters:
        com - The input string that holds information about the appointment to be booked.

      • checkTheDates

        private boolean checkTheDates​(Date dob,
                              Date appt)
        Checks if the date of birth and appointment date are valid. If either is not valid, the function will print an error message to the console.
        Parameters:
        dob - The date of birth to check.
        appt - The appointment date to check.
        Returns:
        true if both dates are valid and false if not.

      • buildAppointment

        private Appointment buildAppointment​(java.lang.String com)
        Creates and returns an instance of the Appointment class based in the input string if it is valid. If the time or location is not valid, it will print an error message to the console.
        Parameters:
        com - The input string that holds information about the appointment to be created.
        Returns:
        The created appointment object if the appointment is valid, null if not.

      • removeAllAppointment

        private void removeAllAppointment​(java.lang.String com)
        Removes all appointments of a certain patient from the schedule, if the patient exists.
        Parameters:
        com - Input string containing information about the Patient to remove all appointments of.
